CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Month(Today()) < 7&&Financial_Year__c = text(Year(today())), Month(Today())>=7&& Financial_Year__c = text(Year(today())+1)),"THIS YEAR", IF(OR(Month(Today())>=7&&Financial_Year__c =text(Year(today())), Month(Today())<7&&Financial_Year__c =text(Year(today())-1)),"LAST YEAR","NA") )
CustomField.label: Current/Last Year
